__TOC__

Alexandre Prokoudine (Александр Прокудин), member of Ubuntu, GNOME and KDE translation teams. Focuses his contributive work on graphics and sound related applications (Scribus, GIMP, Inkscape, hugin, Audacity, Rosegarden etc.) that mostly consists of GUI/docs translations, writing docs (both English and Russian), writing specs and usability improvement proposals. One of initiators and main contributors to <nowiki>[[http://create.freedesktop.org/wiki/index.php/About|CREATE]]</nowiki> project.

Active Web projects:

* <nowiki>[[http://libregraphicsworld.org|Libre Graphics World]]</nowiki> — news, articles and tutorials on free graphic design, DTP and 3D software (English)
* <nowiki>[[http://linuxgraphics.ru|Графика в Linux]]</nowiki> — news and tutorials on graphic design, DTP and 3D software, avid community project (Russian)
* <nowiki>[[http://linuxsound.ru|Звук в Linux]]</nowiki> — news, articles and tutorials on music production software, avid community project (Russian)
* <nowiki>[[http://linuxvideo.ru|Видео в Linux]]</nowiki> — news, articles and tutorials on video related software (Russian)
* <nowiki>[[http://gimp.ru|GIMP.ru]]</nowiki> — official Russian GIMP's website: development news, tutorials, avid community project

Also started <nowiki>[[http://openfontlibrary.org|openfontlibrary.org]]</nowiki>.
